sidebar.heading: Get Started
sidebar.paragraph: Connecting a crypto wallet is like “logging in” for an application. It will allow you to do things with the items in your wallet. Etc...

selectingWallet.recommendedWalletsPart2: on this platform. Please use/install one of the supported wallets to continue
selectingWallet.installWallet: You do not have any wallets installed that {app} supports, please contact for supported wallets

sidebar.paragraph: This dapp requires access to your wallet, please login and authorize access to your MetaMask accounts to continue.
{dapp} is now connected to your wallet
